rooms.desc: A room painted in pastel pinks and yellows, the floor is completely covered in frilly cushions seemingly from your grandmothers house.

actors.name: dying traveler
actors.examine: he lays there, motioning you over, so you can speak to him

dialogues.text: Its too late for me man, i got nothing left, I am going to die soon, but i got some info for you on on how to get out of here, perhaps you can do something better with it
I found a clue two rooms south from here, I left it there so others may find it, behind the silver brick. Please escape from this hellish place, and tell my wife I love her.
There is a talking button down one room, he said could help me, but alas I fell on my sword before I could help him. Its all very embarrassing don't tell my wife.

backgrounds.name: Chandelier
backgrounds.examine: It lays on the floor like a broken chandelier would

backgrounds.name: author defined Examine Distraction
backgrounds.examine: you look at it, you hear some whirring in the distance, your examine stat goes up

events.text: In front of you lays a dying a traveler, a small sword sticking out of his chest.
He didn't actually tell you who he is... but he did die.

actors.name: wizard hat
actors.examine: its a wizards hat, it has a face, presumably it can also talk

dialogues.text: ah yeah, that button is a bit annoying. if you can get me a book from the bookshelf and a translation tablet from the pedestal i can give you that gold bar. I am not tall enough to reach them myself
thanks mate, just leave them on the ground and talk to me again
thanks mate, just leave them on the ground and talk to me again

events.text: as the hat leaves with the tablet and the book it uncovers a gold bar that was sitting underneath it
There is a key behind this couch

items.name: book
items.examine: the book shows pictures of manufacturing a golden key. The words are in some alien language, perhaps there is something that could help translate it in the nearby rooms

backgrounds.name: bookshelf
backgrounds.examine: a bookshelf filled to the brim with suspicious books

events.text: you see a glint underneath the couch.
a suspicious book sticks out of the bookshelf.

dialogues.text: Hey, you. you look like you need some help getting out of here. wanna do me a favor? I can get you a key to open that door.
There is this wizard over in room 2 that owes me a golden bar he stole from somewhere.
Ah yeah you, thanks bud. the last guy I asked to help me just sorta fell on his sword before I could even tell him what I wanted. I think he died. Just leave that on the ground
oh yeah. sorry about that i forgot. uhh, hold on

events.text: you continue to hear the yelp to the north
a talking button yells at you as you walk in
The talking button fashions a key out of half the gold bar. It happens so fast that you aren't quite sure how, and you swear it had hands but it doesnt now.

rooms.desc: You awaken at a golden door. You need to get through it to escape this place.

events.text: you fired an examine event
you picked up anton? this isnt possible
you dropped anton... this also isnt possible
you gave anton the ball-item, hurrah, hurrah!

backgrounds.name: Golden Door
backgrounds.examine: A golden door with a golden lock for a golden key

events.text: You place the key in the keyhole. it opens, and you step through. you have escaped...
you hear a yell from the west

items.name: holocube
items.examine: cubic, yet kinda rubbery, would probably bounce pretty well if you chucked it, but you are afraid you might not find it again.

backgrounds.name: pedestal
backgrounds.examine: it shows a picture of different creatures speaking to each other. maybe its a translation device.

events.text: you touch the book to the pedestal momentarily before pulling it back. A hologram appears before you and starts to speak.
you put the holocube back into the pedestal. it repeats its message

the hologram screams out: TRANSLATION WRITTEN! FILE 'BOOK TRANSLATION' NOT READABLE IN THIS DEVICE! PLEASE INSERT HOLOCUBE INTO COMPATIBLE DEVICE, THIS IS NOT A COMPATIBLE DEVICE! A holocube ejects and bounces off the floor in an erratic fashion.

items.name: silver-brick
items.examine: all in all, its a silver brick in the wall
items.invDesc: its not solid silver, just a coating

events.text: there is something behind the brick!

backgrounds.name: note
backgrounds.examine: Hey, look behind the couch in room 3, I stuck something pretty good back there ;)

events.text: Just as the dying dude said, there is a single brick hidden among the gold.

backgrounds.name: bookshelf
backgrounds.examine: a bookshelf with a book clearly missing. perhaps you can fit something into here

events.text: you place the book in the bookshelf and it starts to wildly shake around until both the book and the keymold pop out.

backgrounds.name: projector
backgrounds.examine: its a hologram projector mounted in the wall. might even be a whole entire home hologram theater system if this was a home

events.text: it details a process of pouring molten gold in a keymold, and even opens a slot to place the keymold in
you put the keymold in the slot. it closes, buzzes and whirs for a bit, and a key pops out with the mold
